Review this codebase and look forward to finding potential bugs and errors.
Focus only on already existing things, disregard new features or tools.
Assess code organization and structure for maintainability.
Check for adherence to coding standards and best practices.
Evaluate the repository for redundancy and code duplication.
Ensure that documentation is clear and provides necessary insights into the codebase.
Verify that the repository includes a license file.
Check for a clear versioning strategy and changelog.
